text:
Concerned about the violence that has engulfed his home State Haryana owing to the Jat agitation for reservation, star Indian boxer Vijender Singh appealed for peace on Sunday.

Vijender, who is gearing up to fight his fourth professional bout on March 12 in Liverpool, posted a video message on his Twitter page. “I appeal to my Jat brothers to maintain peace and brotherhood in Haryana. It is absolutely essential for us, our families, our State and our country,” he said . — PTI
title: Vijender’s plea
